actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the program of supplemental security income for the aged, blind, and disabled (established by title XVI of the Social Security Act) to provide for cost-of-living increases in the benefits provided thereunder.

summary.text: Provides for cost-of-living increases in the benefits provided under (Supplemental Security Income for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) title XVI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the program of supplemental security income for the aged, blind, and disabled (established by title XVI of the Social Security Act) to provide for cost-of-living increases in the benefits provided thereunder.
